dao.name: QRY_CHARACTER_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, character_cod, character_nam, sys_default, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from character_rf where athena_id = trim(:athena_id) and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_CHARACTER_RMK
dao.statement: select character_cod character_rmk, character_nam,sys_default from character_rf where trim(athena_id) = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = ?
